The Blood moon skin is an Ionian thing and the champions that are not Ionian are viewed as though they were part of the Ionian culture everything about the Blood Moon is Ionian meaning Riot never actually has to give a Blood Moon skin to Diana.

The Blood Moon is a term for the look of the moon on the Night of the Ionian Fire Festival.
